title: Man Utd's Harry Maguire slammed as 'amateur' by Rafael van der Vaart

Manchester United defender Harry Maguire was the subject of an astonishing attack by Rafael van der Vaart, with the former Tottenham man comparing him to 'amateurs'.

Van der Vaart said if Maguire is worth the world-record £80m United paid for him in the summer, then Liverpool's Virgil van Dijk is worth £300m.

Maguire made 10 clearances during United's 1-1 draw with Liverpool at Old Trafford in the Premier League on Sunday, in which the Red Devils' defence were eventually undone by a late Adam Lallana equaliser.

Despite United's lowly league position of 13th, only three Premier League defences have conceded less than Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's side - Liverpool, Leicester City and Sheffield United.

Maguire has been integral to that, with the 26-year-old having formed a promising centre-half partnership with Victor Lindelof.

(Image: REUTERS)

But Van der Vaart - who has criticised Maguire before - said he could find 'amateurs' who could do the same job as the England centre-half.

"He can do something, but if he is worth so much money, Virgil van Dijk is worth £300million," Van der Vaart said on Ziggo Sport .

"If I am going to play with the amateurs on Sunday afternoon, I can easily find three who can do this. I mean that seriously.

"A bit silly to say, but I really think so."

(Image: Getty)

Van der Vaart previously said Maguire was "the worst player on the pitch" when England were beaten 3-1 by Holland in the UEFA Nations League in June.

The former midfielder-turned-darts player told Sky Sports: “It’s funny because during the Nations League, I was doing work for Dutch television.

“And I remember we were saying ‘Harry Maguire was by far the worst player on the pitch’.

“"And then two months later, £80-£90m? Unbelievable."

United signed Maguire from Leicester this summer for £80m - a world-record fee for a defender which eclipsed the previous mark of £75m which Liverpool paid for Van Dijk.
description: If United defender is worth £80m then Virgil van Dijk is worth £300m, says former Tottenham striker
